reviewText: Some parts were skipped on the video they were just blank.  Ray Jamison
Got a much better understaning of the battle where many Marines died.

excellent dvd, most of us oldtimers getting long in the tooth have seen much of this film through the years on history of this battle. We must never forget the sacrifices made by our brave young men, still interned on that island. A horrific battle.

The best documentary on the battle of Peleliu that I have watched.  I would have liked for it to have more about the 81st Infantry Division in it, but still a very good video.  Primarily actual battle scenes are shown, and covers some of the Japanese preparations for the battle.  This is a good video for those interested in the battle on Peleliu and the war in the Pacific in general.
There was little information to be found about this battle in the library so we were thrilled to find this excellent documentary on the subject for my son's history day project.
